title: i want to use msnbc. it says i need adobe flash, but i don't know how, and i feel i might be too old to learn how. i have a chrome book
content: i give up. i'm too old. i wish i knew where to go to learn "computerese" my sister is a computer programmer in Ca. i'm just an old woman who wishes to emulate mother teresa and who likes learning languages on duo lingo, but sometimes i would like to know a little more how to use a computer without tearing your hair out.
